divs: Sighting Detailsback from 03-09-2012 to 03-15-2012 Their was a UFO sucking energy from the sun, on CNN FOX and other news areas it was shown as UFO sucking energy from the sun. As shown on HelioViewer it takes Video Footage every day of our sun and you can go back to those dates to see what happened. Its happening again on the dates from 06-12-2013 to at least 06-16-2013 still going on, just noticed again. check it out for yourself, install HelioViewer and check out those dates! Instructions. Install HelioViewer and start it, Delete Current layer. Add Layer click the start and end date calenders and make sure its the same year, you want somewhere around a 1 week span. you want SDO, AIA, 171A, you will see it in on the drop down menus. type in the dates I had given you and you will see the same UFO is back.
